summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Lighting Department authorizing the transfer of jurisdiction of portions of certain City (Lighting Department) property and certain property rights appurtenant thereto in the Southwest one-quarter of the Northeast one-quarter of Section 3, Township 23 North, Range 4 East W.M. to the Engineering Department for street and sanitary sewer purposes (empire Way South Sanitary Sewer Interceptor and Lift Station).
